The Hellion's Heart

The Hellion's Heart is a Companion Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. The Hellion's Heart can be acquired from Karlach as part of Our Fiery Friend during act tba. Completing The Hellion's Heart will progress Karlach story progression forward.

The Hellion's Heart Objectives

Find an infernal mechanic.

Karlach needs an infernal mechanic to tune up the engine she has for a heart. There might be one n
